title: Best of The Herd: 05/10/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/10/2019
description:
In the biggest 76ers game in almost 20 years, Colin talks about how great Ben Simmons was and why he is the guy the 76ers need to build around.  He says that the Lakers should have been concerned about LeBron taking over the team but instead they got consumed by it. Plus, The Athletic's Marcus Thompson talks about what this series means to Chris Paul's legacy and why the Warriors are still his pick to advance. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
